name: Time's Up.
description:
STORY

You awake in the middle of a dark maze with nothing but a flashlight. all you can hear is a faint song in the background, but as you move through, the song seems to get more complex.

CONTROLS

W and S to move, Mouse to point the character and Q to sprint.

INSTRUCTIONS

Get to the portal in each level to progress in the maze. The catch? You have to complete each level before the music stops, or else.

CREDITS

Music: Time's Up (Suspense) By SamurIBeatz(Me)
